attributes.title: This app killed some of my brain cells
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted more information over trump.. then I looked into the app and realized I started to feel dumb. So I continued.. and then I realized as I continued to feed into the bs I became even more stupider.. then at last my brain is fried.. I think Apple should remove this app to save other innocent people.

attributes.title: All apps matter
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible. Within minutes of downloading this app it threatened to sell my first born childâ€™s soul to the devil, and murder my grandmother. I think by downloading it i have somehow become possessed and now I have to call my local priest to perform an exorcism (which is very hard to schedule during a pandemic). Do NOT recommend!

attributes.title: i am APALLED ğŸ’‹.  ï¸¶ğŸ‘„ï¸¶
attributes.review:
Oh, to see without my eyes
The first time that you kissed me
Boundless by the time I cried
I built your walls around me
White noise, what an awful sound
Fumbling by Rogue River
Feel my feet above the ground
Hand of God, deliver me
Oh, oh woe-oh-woah is me
The first time that you touched me
Oh, will wonders ever cease?
Blessed be the mystery of love
Lord, I no longer believe
Drowned in living waters
Cursed by the love that I received
From my brother's daughter
Like Hephaestion, who died
Alexander's lover
Now my riverbed has dried
Shall I find no other?
Oh, oh woe-oh-woah is me
I'm running like a plover
Now I'm prone to misery
The birthmark on your shoulder reminds me
How much sorrow can I take?â€¦

attributes.title: IT RUINED MY PHONE
attributes.review: I downloaded it and felt uncomfortable to share my location AND my phone number. Thats private. Plus I would not like a homophobic and racist person to have that information. It jammed up my phone and constantly made it freeze up. And then took up so much storage as well! I hate it and I hate him:)

attributes.title: Donâ€™t waste your time.
attributes.review: This is quite possibly the worst app I have ever used. Not only does it glitch like crazy but it says that some washed up celebrity from like the 90s is running for the presidency. I have never been more appalled by the layout of an app and the people behind creating it should be ashamed of themselves.

attributes.title: THIS IS A BBADDD IDDEA
attributes.review: this is the worst app that is in the app store! it took me almost 50 tries to download and i was finally able to open the app after waiting 22 weeks. i cant believe people are giving this app anything but 1 star. my whole iphone was wiped and i lost all my contacts and photos. smh this is just disappointing and wasteful.
